thread.title: Ryan Seacrest and girlfriend Shayna Taylor leave the gym | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Ryan Seacrest and girlfriend Shayna Taylor leave the gym | Daily Mail Online

author: Brittany Valadez For Mailonline
title: Ryan Seacrest and girlfriend Shayna Taylor leave the gym | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share The Keeping Up With Kardashians executive producer completed his look with a black baseball cap and Nike trainers. Girlfriend Shayna paired a fitted, long-sleeve top with dark-coloured leggings, trainers, shades and weight-lifting gloves. Pretty: Girlfriend Shayna paired a fitted, long-sleeve top with dark-coloured leggings, trainers, shades and weight-lifting gloves When it comes to the world of hosting, Ryan sets the standard. On Monday, Nick Cannon, then-host of NBC's America's Got Talent, announced he was leaving the show after a dispute with the show's bosses. When asked by TMZ on Thursday who should replace him on the show, the comedienne responded: 'That's a tough one. But...Ryan Seacrest. I'd think he'd be good.They all used to call me the black Ryan Seacrest, he can be the white Nick Cannon.' Sets the bar: When it comes to the world of hosting, Ryan sets the standard. He is pictured earlier this month in LA Following a gym session, the TMZ cameras caught up with Ryan after his gym session. When told that he was in rumored to be taking over the AGT hosting gig, the star claimed it was the 'first time' he heard the news. 'I haven't heard anything about that. He's [Nick Cannon] is great on that show. By the way, it's a fantastic show. That show could be around forever.' After the photographer pointed out that Simon Cowell is a judge and he could be the host -a situation reminscent of American Idol- Ryan continued to work his away around a definete yes or no response. 'This is so much breaking news I can't even ingest it,' he answered. 'Ryan Seacrest!': Nick Cannon, then-host of NBC's America's Got Talent, announced he was leaving the show after a dispute with the show's bosses. He wasked who should replace him.
